name: Floor Is Lava
description:
Floor is Lava is an action-packed platformer game with puzzle elements that will take you on an exciting adventure to help a little inhabitant of a deep cave escape the oncoming lava. The main objective of the game is to reach the exit of each level without touching the lava floor. To do so, you'll need to use the movement of the boxes to create a path and navigate through the obstacles. Floor is Lava features 30 levels with varying degrees of difficulty, offering you a thrilling experience as you progress through the levels.

In addition to the challenging levels, the game also offers players the ability to earn achievements as they progress through the game. This feature adds an additional layer of challenge and replayability to the game, making it even more fun and exciting.


  • Challenging gameplay: Floor is Lava offers a challenging gameplay experience where players must use their problem-solving skills to navigate through obstacles and avoid the lava floor.
  • Puzzle elements: The game includes puzzle elements, which require players to think creatively and use their surroundings to reach the exit of each level.
  • 8-bit music: The game's soundtrack features 8-bit music adds to the retro-style of the game and immerses players into the action-packed adventure.
  • Beautiful graphics: The game's graphics, are visually stunning and bring the world of the game to life with vivid colors and imaginative design.
  • 30 levels of varying difficulty: Floor is Lava offers a long-lasting gameplay experience with 30 levels of varying difficulty, providing players with hours of challenging and entertaining gameplay.
